Codo » Index » Epoch » Events

Class: Epoch.Events

Defined in: coffee/epoch.coffee

Overview

Basic eventing base class for all Epoch classes.

Direct Known Subclasses

Epoch.Chart.Base

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) on(name, callback) Registers a callback to a given event.
  • # (void) off(name, callback) Removes a specific callback listener or all listeners for a given event.
  • # (void) trigger(name) Triggers an event causing all active listeners to be executed.

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor()

Instance Method Details

# (void) on(name, callback)

Registers a callback to a given event.

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name of the event.
  • callback ( Function, String ) — Either a closure to call when the event fires or a string that denotes a method name to call on this object.

# (void) off(name, callback)

Removes a specific callback listener or all listeners for a given event.

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name of the event.
  • callback ( Function, String ) — (Optional) Callback to remove from the listener list. If this parameter is not provided then all listeners will be removed for the event.

# (void) trigger(name)

Triggers an event causing all active listeners to be executed.

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name of the event to fire.
